tool_description: Generates industry benchmark statistics and percentile rankings for financial metrics and valuation multiples to provide context for company valuations.

benchmark_metrics.description: Financial and valuation metrics to benchmark

company_size_segment.description: Company size category for more relevant benchmarks

error_messages: Invalid industry identifier: Provide a valid industry classification code or recognized industry name.
Unsupported benchmark metrics: Use supported financial and valuation metrics for benchmark generation.
Insufficient industry data: Not enough companies in the specified industry segment to generate reliable benchmarks.
Invalid size segment: Use supported size segments like 'small_cap', 'mid_cap', 'large_cap', or 'all'.
usage: Specify industry_identifier and benchmark_metrics, optionally filter by company_size_segment, time_period, and geographical_scope. Returns industry benchmark statistics.

benchmark_statistics.description: Statistical benchmarks for each metric (mean, median, quartiles)

industry_profile.description: Overview of industry characteristics and trends

sample_size.description: Number of companies included in benchmark calculations
